attributes.action: Stop Trump And Putin dividing NATO
attributes.additional_details: The Political climate in the world is changing quickly, be prepared, don't get caught out, things can escalate quickly with the current US administration, difficult times are coming for fair minded people.
attributes.background: Stop Trump and Putin dividing the NATO alliance, increase defence spending and strengthen the relationship between the members of the NATO alliance, curb the divide and conquer rhetoric and show a united front, Stand With Ukraine and all other countries bordering Russia.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705399
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/718643
